snippet: A new bond-buying plan from the European Central Bank is promising and comes not a moment too soon.
abstract: Editorial applauds a new bond-buying plan from the European Central Bank; contends that the plan is an important step toward saving the euro, and now Europe's leaders must follow up with further efforts to strengthen the currency union.
lead_paragraph: A new bond-buying plan from the European Central Bank is promising and comes not a moment too soon.

headline.seo: The Latest Attempt to Save the Euro
headline.main: The Latest Attempt to Save the Euro
headline.print_headline: The Latest Attempt to Save the Euro
